name: Naga Siren
description: Enchanting sea maidens who wield dark songs to debilitate foes. Their haunting melodies can slow enemies and drain their will to fight.

abilities.name: Song of Weakness
abilities.description: Sings a demoralizing song that reduces enemy damage by 25% and armor by 3 for 8 seconds.

abilities.name: Mana Tide
abilities.description: Restores 30 mana to all friendly units in a radius over 5 seconds.

texts: My song will be your end.
